locations.name: Aix-en-Provence
locations.description: The elegant heart of Provence, known for its historical architecture, bustling markets, shaded squares, and association with the painter Cézanne.

locations.name: Saint-Tropez
locations.description: A legendary Côte d'Azur destination famous for its glamorous reputation, charming old fishing village core, beautiful beaches like Pampelonne, and vibrant port.

locations.name: Nice
locations.description: The vibrant capital of the French Riviera, featuring the colorful Vieux Nice (Old Town), the iconic Promenade des Anglais, art museums, and panoramic views from Castle Hill.
